constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 98 (Wednesday, June 8, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. MURPHY of Florida:
H.R. 7985.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1, which gives Congress the
power to lay and collect taxes and provide for the general
welfare of the United States.
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 3, which gives Congress the
power to regulate commerce with foreign nations.
[Page H5409]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

title: Repeal Tariffs to Reduce Inflation Act of 2022
